p: The results obtained from biosynthesized FeNPs using the SH extract by the EDX mapping method are shown in Figure 6. Accordingly, the significant compositions of SH essential oil are truly distributed all over the FeNPs, as O and Fe are the essential elements of these NPs. Herein, the high quantity of Fe ions within these NPs emphasizes the successful synthesis of magnetite NPs with SH essential oil [ 70].
